issue.title: [Go] migrate from pkg/errors to x/xerrors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7357](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7357). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
we should migrate away from `pkg/errors` to `golang.org/x/xerrors` to ensure better error handling (and one that is Go-1.13 compatible).
